faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.intro: Find here the answers to the most common questions about our services.

questions.question: What are the benefits of acupuncture?
questions.answer: Acupuncture helps rebalance the body's energy, relieve pain, reduce stress, and improve overall well-being.

questions.question: How many sessions are necessary to get results?
questions.answer: The number of sessions depends on the condition being treated. Some people feel benefits after the first session, while others may require multiple consultations.

questions.question: Are your services suitable for everyone?
questions.answer: Yes, our services are suitable for adults, children, and seniors. However, some techniques may be adapted according to individual needs.

questions.question: Do you offer personalized consultations?
questions.answer: Yes, each consultation is tailored based on the client's needs and goals.

questions.question: What are the contraindications for treatments?
questions.answer: Certain specific conditions, such as acute infections, open wounds, or high-risk pregnancies, may require adjustments or avoidance of certain treatments.

questions.question: Can I book a session online?
questions.answer: Yes, you can book a session directly online via our website or by contacting us by phone.

presentation.title: Who am I?
presentation.name: Alana Tureza
presentation.subtitle: Acupuncture & Wellness
presentation.intro: "I am a qualified professional with over 16 years of experience in healthcare, specializing in traditional Chinese acupuncture, therapeutic massage, and wellness. My goal is to guide you towards physical and energetic balance, in harmony with your spirit."

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Discover our different approaches for optimal well-being

massageRelaxant.title: Relaxing Massage
massageRelaxant.description: Enjoy a relaxing massage to soothe tensions and regain harmony between body and mind. Ideal for reducing stress and improving sleep quality.

massageSportif.title: Sports Massage
massageSportif.description: Specifically designed for athletes and active individuals, this massage targets muscle recovery and injury prevention. Perfect before or after intense effort.

acupuncture.title: Traditional Acupuncture
acupuncture.description: Discover the benefits of acupuncture, a millennial practice that rebalances vital energy, relieves pain, and improves blood circulation.

shiatsu.title: Shiatsu Koho-Igaku
shiatsu.description: A Japanese technique using finger pressure to harmonize the body's energies. Ideal for reducing stress and releasing tensions.

espaceSoin.title: Your Care Space
espaceSoin.description: Our space, located in Barra da Lagoa (Florianópolis), offers a zen and warm setting conducive to total relaxation. Every detail is designed to promote your well-being.

relaxamentoEssencial.title: Essential Relaxation
relaxamentoEssencial.description: A break for your body and mind: choose between therapeutic massage or acupuncture to relieve tensions.

harmoniaProfunda.title: Deep Harmony
harmoniaProfunda.description: 1h30 of therapeutic massage or 1h of combined massage with foot bath to revitalize your energies.

bemEstarSupremo.title: Supreme Well-Being
bemEstarSupremo.description: The perfect combination: relaxing massage and acupuncture for a transformative experience.

renoveSuaEnergia.title: Renew Your Energy
renoveSuaEnergia.description: For those seeking continuous and deep care, ideal for relieving accumulated stress.

transformacaoTotal.title: Total Transformation
transformacaoTotal.description: The ideal care plan to transform your well-being with prolonged treatments.

massagemTherapeutica.title: Therapeutic Massage
massagemTherapeutica.description: Discover the power of 10 massage sessions to restore your health and balance.

acupunturaIntensiva.title: Intensive Acupuncture
acupunturaIntensiva.description: A dedicated plan to treat discomforts and promote internal balance.
